WorkItem.Description:
This request is from Rub member of the uNhAddIns project (Unofficial addins for NHibernate): http://code.google.com/p/unhaddins/

Change the data model to allow developers to implement the three basic strategies for inheritance mapping:

1. Table per Class Hierarchy
2. Table per Subclass
3. Table per Concrete Class

For more info, see:
http://www.nhforge.org/doc/nh/en/index.html#inheritance
WorkItem.Summary: Feature Request: Data model change to allow implementation of inheritance mapping strategies
